sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Cart = ({ cartItems, onQuantityChange, onPlaceOrder }) => { const [address, setAddress] = useState(''); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('cash'); const total = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); const handlePlaceOrder = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onPlaceOrder(address, paymentMethod); }; return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : (
{cartItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.name}

₹{item.price}

onQuantityChange(index, parseInt(e.target.value))} className="w-20 px-2 py-1 border rounded" />

₹{item.price * item.quantity}

))}

Order Summary

Subtotal ₹{total}

Delivery Free

Total ₹{total}
